testimonials.text: Never backs down from any technical challenge. Impeccable balance of pragmatism, perfectionism, and dedication to quickly deliver exceptional custom software solutions. Had the honor and privilege to manage and partner with Ankit for over two years. Ankit‚Äôs efforts further propelled a team of ‚Äúdevelopers in sales‚Äù to new heights in accelerating value for Splunk‚Äôs customers. Served as the ML leader allowing the team to expand further into advanced POC‚Äôs. He‚Äôs the ultimate team player: humble, hungry, smart and unselfish in every way. Very likely the smartest guy in the room and you‚Äôd never know it. Can‚Äôt recommend highly enough. Look forward to any opportunity to work with him again.
